column4: there's a mp3 tag editor listed on the Restricted formats page on the help files.
anyone here able to help me with DVD playback?

u followed the guide by the book? encryption library and such..
u need all components, enable universe and multiverse
and I've tried running on minimum resoloution just to see if that helped.
for me that's encryption pb. u should try to go over the guide once again...

try installing mplayer or oggledvd to see if it does the same
ok sorry, not oggledvd, it was ogle
